Online videos:

  • The Coding Train by Daniel Shiffman
  • A Gentle Introduction to Neural Networks and making your own with Python by Tariq Rashid
  • Machine Learning Foundations by Hsuan-Tien Lin

I would really encourage you to try build a neural network from scratch, if you really would like to master it, just like you have to jump into the pool if you really want to learn swimming.
